sendMessage.label: Send Twitch message
sendMessage.tooltip: If enabled the script will send a Twitch message when stream goes live

DsendMessage.label: Send Discord message
DsendMessage.tooltip: If enabled the script will send a Discord message when stream goes live

emoteonly.label: Emote only mode
emoteonly.tooltip: If enabled the script will set chat to emote only mode

subonly.label: Subscriber only mode
subonly.tooltip: If enabled the script will set chat to subscriber only mode

slowmode.label: Slowmode
slowmode.tooltip: If enabled the script will set chat to slowmode

followers.label: Followers only mode
followers.tooltip: If enabled the script will set chat to followers only mode

r9k.label: R9KBeta
r9k.tooltip: If enabled the script will activate r9kbeta

unhost.label: Unhost when going live
unhost.tooltip: If enabled the script will unhost automatically when you go live

message.value: Stream is now live! If you can't see it hit refresh
message.label: Twitch message
message.tooltip: If enabled the script will send this message to Twitch when stream goes live

Dmessage.value: @everyone Stream is now live! Come join me over at {0}
Dmessage.label: Discord message
Dmessage.tooltip:
If enabled the script will send this message to Discord when stream goes live 
{0} = Stream url

slowmodeinfo.label: Slowmode time
slowmodeinfo.tooltip: How long slowmode it should be in seconds

followersinfo.label: Followers only mode
followersinfo.tooltip:
If enabled the script will set chat to followers only mode 
 
 Here are a few examples, which can be any time up to 3 months:
 30m or  30 minutes
 2h  or  1 hours
 2d  or  2 days
 1w  or  1 week
 3mo or  3 months

TestOff.label: Test Going Live
TestOff.tooltip: Update chat settings according to the saved settings

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
